pages.text: In the era when I was born, these things were elevated to the altar. People indulged themselves in the endless wealth it brought...
But the injustice in society did not disappear because of it. Along with bringing prosperity, it also brought endless greed.
Out of responsibility, I will still introduce it to you. But please be cautious of its power.

pages.title: guidance of mystical agriculture
pages.text: This book has already provided detailed explanations. This section serves merely as an additional supplement.

pages.title: tier 1
pages.text: The most basic farmland can only grow a limited kinds of resources.

pages.heading: tier 2
pages.text: Inject a little blood, and it can plant those resources that are both cheap and unimportant.

pages.title: tier 3
pages.text: Inject a little magic, and it can grow those cheap but important resources.

pages.title: tier 4
pages.text: Inject a bit of stardust, and it can grow those resources that aren't so cheap.

pages.title: tier 5
pages.text: Inject the remnants of the dragon, and it will be able to cultivate those precious resources.

pages.title: tier 6
pages.text: Inject alchemical substances, and it will be able to replicate the powers of those powerful creatures.

pages.title: The Creative Essence
pages.text: Item that exist only in legend. Its purpose is unknown.
